name: Álvaro de la Herrán
introduction: Álvaro de la Herrán is a director based in Madrid (Spain). He has been working as film director doing fiction shorts, branded content, advertising, fashion films and music videos. In his work he puts together visual storytelling and music with a elegant and mesmerist impact. He has a personal aesthetic with a smart balance between emotional and intellectual inputs. He won several film prices with his short films, and was invited by Los Angeles Cinematheque in 2004 to show his film "Business" after be part of Palm Springs short film festival. His short film "Mine" for GQ Magazine has received more than 16 millions of views. Actually Alvaro is working on his first feature film as director.
